duties_responsibilities.duty: Talking to prospective users of software products, conducting qualitative research, and engaging with a wide range of audience including senior execs and project managers.
Providing accurate and timely forecasts to sales management, maintaining knowledge of products, technologies, and industry trends, generating external sources of lead, and following up on leads.
Preparing and hosting product demonstrations, identifying decision makers within targeted leads, and supporting marketing efforts such as trade shows and exhibits.
Overcoming concerns or objections from prospective customers.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree or equivalent preferred with 1-3 years of sales experience in the SAAS industry. Consistent track record of meeting/exceeding sales quota.
